etymology.description: Depicts the side view of a dog
etymology.interpretation: The character 犭(quǎn, "dog") is a simplified form depicting a dog in profile, used as a component in other characters to signify relation to animals or beasts.

examples.chinese: 看这个偏旁是犭(看這個偏旁是犭)，说明许多字与狗有关(說明許多字與狗有關)。
examples.pinyin: Kàn zhège piānpáng shì quǎn, shuōmíng xǔduō zì yǔ gǒu yǒuguān.
examples.english: Observing that this radical is 犭 indicates that many characters are related to dogs.

examples.chinese: 犭作为偏旁常用于涉及动物的字(犭作為偏旁常用於涉及動物的字)，传达出狗的形象(傳達出狗的形象)。
examples.pinyin: Quǎn zuòwéi piānpáng cháng yòng yú shèjí dòngwù de zì, chuándá chū gǒu de xíngxiàng.
examples.english: The radical 犭, used in characters related to animals, conveys the image of a dog.

examples.chinese: 学习汉字时(學習漢字時)，了解犭的起源有助于记忆字形(了解犭的起源有助於記憶字形)。
examples.pinyin: Xuéxí hànzì shí, liǎojiě quǎn de qǐyuán yǒuzhù yú jìyì zìxíng.
examples.english: When learning Chinese characters, understanding the origin of the radical 犭 helps in memorizing their structures.
